    • Method Detail

      • setCrossFadeEnabled

        public DrawableCrossFadeFactory.Builder setCrossFadeEnabled​(boolean isCrossFadeEnabled)
        Enables or disables animating the alpha of the Drawable the cross fade will animate from.

        Defaults to false.

        Parameters:
        isCrossFadeEnabled - If true the previous Drawable's alpha will be animated from 100 to 0 while the new Drawable's alpha is animated from 0 to 100. Otherwise the previous Drawable's alpha will remain at 100 throughout the animation. See TransitionDrawable.setCrossFadeEnabled(boolean)

      • build

        public DrawableCrossFadeFactory build()
